subject: Presidential Task Force on Cov
body:
Presidential Task Force on Covid-19
1201 Roxas Boulevard
Manila, Philippines 1000
U.S. Consular Agency ( Cebu City, Philippines )
Attention.
Due to the Covid 19 Pandemic around the globe. The Government has set up this means to reach up to the Scam Victims that are yet to receive
their Funds. This Organization has set up compensation scheme which your email address was among the list to benefit a token Bank Draft of
$153,000.00 only.
Forward your full names, delivery address and telephone number. 
This Bank Draft will be delivered directly from the Government PTF immunity
flight to enable free flow of the said Draft to you.
We are waiting for your response.
Regards
Mrs. Maria Lizette
PTF Coordinator
Reply to: 
MrsMariaLizette@legislator.com

subject: Re: Presidential Task Force on Cov
body:
Hello Mrs. Maria Lizette,

Thank you for reaching out and informing me about this initiative. It's heartening to hear that the government is taking steps to help those affected by the pandemic.

Could you please provide more details about this scheme? How was my email address selected for this benefit? Also, could you explain a bit more about what a Bank Draft is?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sally
